eventsFunctions.fullName: Play a random sound on a channel
eventsFunctions.name: PlayRandomSoundOnChannel
eventsFunctions.sentence: Play the sound _PARAM1_._PARAM2_ with 1 of _PARAM3_ random variations on the channel _PARAM4_, vol.: _PARAM5_, pitch: _PARAM6_, loop: _PARAM7_

inlineCode: eventsFunctionContext.returnValue = lerp(a[0], b[0], time) + ";" + lerp(a[1], b[1], time) + ";" + lerp(a[2], b[2], time);

parameters: GlobalVariable(Scene.Current.Coin) * GlobalVariable(Score.Coin) + GlobalVariable(Scene.Current.Enemy) * GlobalVariable(Score.Enemy) + GlobalVariable(Scene.Current.Heart) * GlobalVariable(Score.Heart) + GlobalVariable(Scene.Current.Skull) * GlobalVariable(Score.Skull)

GlobalVariable(Scene.Total.Coin) * GlobalVariable(Score.Coin) + GlobalVariable(Scene.Total.Enemy) * GlobalVariable(Score.Enemy) + GlobalVariable(Scene.Total.Heart) * GlobalVariable(Score.Heart) + GlobalVariable(Scene.Total.Skull) * GlobalVariable(Score.Skull)

inlineCode: return lerp(a[0], b[0], time) + ";" + lerp(a[1], b[1], time) + ";" + lerp(a[2], b[2], time);

events.comment: Unfortunately, this lags the game a bit too much

eventsFunctions.name: ResetForce
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add to _PARAM0_ a permanent force in its heading direction
